thread.title: Republican Health Care Bill Has 17% Approval Rating

author: Kevin Drum
title: Republican Health Care Bill Has 17% Approval Rating
text:
Republican Health Care Bill Has 17% Approval Rating Kevin Drum Mar. 23, 2017 1:06 PM 
Quinnipiac reports today that public approval for the Republican health care bill is a dismal 17 percent. Allow me to put this into perspective with a bar chart: 
Sad.   Kevin Drum Kevin is a political blogger for Mother Jones . Email Kevin For more of his stories, click here or follow him on Facebook .
